example.title: Code listing: The statistics table
example.programlisting: CREATE TABLE statistics ( id int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, date date NOT NULL default '0000-00-00', uri varchar(255) NOT NULL default '0', browser varchar(10) NOT NULL default '', platform varchar(10) NOT NULL default '', hits int(11) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (id) ) TYPE=MyISAM;
